alert.note: Alert for Accomack; Northampton; Virginia Beach (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued September 10 at 5:31PM EDT until September 11 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...A high risk of rip currents and rough nearshore surf. * WHERE...Maryland Beaches. * WHEN...Through Sunday evening. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. OCEAN CITY INLET MD MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.0 FT, MODERATE 5.0 FT, MAJOR 6.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 2.5 FT, MAJOR 3.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 10/09 PM 3.6 1.1 0.6 1 NONE 11/09 AM 3.3 0.8 0.5 1 NONE 11/10 PM 3.6 1.1 0.7 1 NONE 12/10 AM 3.5 1.0 0.7 1 NONE 12/10 PM 3.6 1.1 0.8 1 NONE 13/10 AM 3.6 1.1 0.8 1 NONE SEWELLS POINT VA MLLW CATEGORIES -
